original_text: There was war again between the Philistines and Israel, and David went down together with his servants, and they fought against the Philistines. And David grew weary.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람이 다시 이스라엘을 치거늘 다윗이 그의 부하들과 함께 내려가서 블레셋 사람과 싸우더니 다윗이 피곤하매

sentences.original_text: There was war again between the Philistines and Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람과 이스라엘 사이에 다시 전쟁이 있었다

sentences.original_text: and David went down together with his servants
and they fought against the Philistines
